targets.expr:
sum by (instance, job) (rate(wc_api_message_duration_sum[5m]))
/
sum by (instance, job) (rate(wc_api_message_duration_count[5m]) > 0)

sum by (instance, job) (rate(wc_weatherinfo_processing_duration_sum[5m]))
/
sum by (instance, job) (rate(wc_weatherinfo_processing_duration_count[5m]) > 0)

targets.rawSql:
WITH 
  "New2" as (SELECT C."RequestTime"::date as "time", Count(distinct(D."id")) as "New"
    FROM "DeviceInfo" D inner join "CityInfo" C on D."id" = C."DeviceInfoId"
    WHERE D."FirstRequestTime"::date = C."RequestTime"::date
    GROUP BY C."RequestTime"::date), 

  "Old2" as (SELECT C."RequestTime"::date as "time", Count(distinct(D."id")) as "Old"
    FROM "DeviceInfo" D inner join "CityInfo" C on D."id" = C."DeviceInfoId"
    WHERE D."FirstRequestTime"::date != C."RequestTime"::date 
    GROUP BY C."RequestTime"::date)
  
SELECT "New2".time, "New2"."New", "Old2"."Old"  FROM "New2" JOIN "Old2" ON "New2".time = "Old2".time
WHERE "New2".time::date = now()::date

SELECT
  date_trunc('hour', "RequestTime") as time,
  count(distinct("DeviceInfoId"))
FROM
  "CityInfo"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("RequestTime") AND date_trunc('hour', "RequestTime") != date_trunc('hour', now())
GROUP BY time

SELECT
  NOW() as time,
  COALESCE(D."DeviceName", 'nil') as "DeviceName",
  count(distinct(D."DeviceId")) as "Count"
FROM
  "DeviceInfo" D JOIN "CityInfo" C ON D."id" = C."DeviceInfoId" AND $__timeFilter(C."RequestTime")

GROUP BY 
  D."DeviceName"
ORDER BY "Count" desc

SELECT NOW() as time, "DeviceName", "count" FROM total_devices
ORDER BY "count" desc;

select
  COALESCE("FaceVersion", 'nil') as "Version",
  count(distinct("DeviceInfoId")) as "Count"
from "CityInfo" 

WHERE
  $__timeFilter("RequestTime")
group by "FaceVersion"
order by "Count" desc

SELECT "Version", "Count" FROM total_versions
ORDER BY "Count" desc;

SELECT
  count(distinct("DeviceInfoId")) AS metric,
  max("Lat") AS lat, max("Lon") lon, "CityName"

FROM "CityInfo"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("RequestTime") AND "CityName" is not NULL
GROUP BY "CityName"

SELECT
  "CityName",
  count(distinct("DeviceInfoId")) AS "Count"

FROM "CityInfo"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("RequestTime") AND "Lat" IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY "CityName"
ORDER BY "Count"
